promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic legendary spider dark-type with dark wings. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or dark. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Cryptaphant, a gigantic legendary spider dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: wicked-torque. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word spider or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, spider-like, legendary, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, violet shadows
generatedDescription: Cryptaphant lurks in eerie crypts, a behemoth of supernatural power. Its wicked-torque moves the shadows to its own dark blessed tune.
